page.title: 10Housing In North Hastings
page.content: Housing in this area is mainly in the south.The north consists mainly of larger homes and some farms.The houses range from some Victorian,to a few small estates of new houses.The oldest housing is probably in{Ore Village and along the main thoroughfare such as{The Ridge and St.Helens Road.There {is one large estate called The {Broomgrove Estate.There are many {different types of houses for example {_bungalows,semi_detatched,detached, {terraced houses and flats.However, {there are not many flats.Some are {converted from larger terraced {Victorian houses and those at {Broomgrove are no more than four {floors}high.Almost all the houses have their own gardens.The houses are built of{brick}with mainly{tiled}roofs.The prices in this area vary from about {Â£18,000}to{Â£80,000.
